nodes.text: Takvaa was a Kadas'sa'Nikto who worked for Jabba the Hutt during the Imperial Era. Jabba considered Takvaa to be one of his favorite enforcers during the time they worked together.

On a mission to receive a Givin codebreaker who knew Imperial security codes, Takvaa along with Greedo and several of Jabba's mercenaries went to Mygeeto to retrieve him. During the mission, Greedo used Takvaa as a shield against a Muun guard with a stun baton. Takvaa was hit by the baton and was fatally wounded.
Takvaa first appeared in Galaxy's Edge 2, a comic written by Ethan Sacks and illustrated by Will Sliney.
